channel.title: the atmosphere on The Garden of Epicurus | Playground for children and adults
channel.description: Recent content in the atmosphere on The Garden of Epicurus | Playground for children and adults

item.title: Iris, can you also see the atmosphere via Zoom?
item.description: Question In the introduction you said that you occasionally look at the atmosphere and read.

item.title: Iris, did people have more energy to work in the past?
item.description: Question I have come across this phenomenon of people telling me that they used to be able to work all day and I wonder if it might be related to the third and fourth dimension of communication that this doesn’t really fit together anymore or what could it be related to?
